## InMemoryBackend class

A fully in-memory `SecretBackend` for testing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class InMemoryBackend implements SecretBackend 
```
**Implements:** [SecretBackend](./vaultkeeper.secretbackend.md)

## Remarks

This backend stores secrets in a plain `Map` and has no external dependencies. It is suitable for unit, integration, and e2e tests.
